message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to start with an offer of $14000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to go up to $12000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I can meet you halfway at $13500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value it holds to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $13000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $13000, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not ready to give up yet. I'll meet you at $13250. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to consider one more negotiation round if you're willing to meet me at a price that's closer to my minimum value of $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13250 and $12000. I'll offer $12625 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $12625, Bob. I think I've already compromised enough. I'm willing to make one more offer, and I'll meet you at $13000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're willing to meet me at $13000, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to go up to $12800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $12800, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not getting any younger. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, but that's it. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm not willing to go back to $13500. I've already gone as high as I'm willing to go. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I'll offer $12900 for the product, and that's my final offer.
